description: Ministry of Labour and Foreign Employment - The Industrial Disputes between M. G. D. Meewatura Ampara and other part Sri Lanka Transport Board Colombo 05 and Sri Lanka Transport Board Ampara Depot - Appoint Mr. R. A. Thilakarathne, Nakkawatta to be the Arbitrator for settlement by Arbitration - The Industrial Disputes between R. P. K. Ranjani, Dankotuwa and other part Ceylon Fisheries Corporation Colombo15 (S & E only)
